sentences.en: It's the verbal equivalent of wearing a monocle, or using an encyclopedia when Wikipedia is at your fingertips.
sentences.cn: 说这个词就像戴单片眼镜，或者明明指尖上就有维基百科却要查大百科全书。

sentences.en: Riding crop, monocle and bullhorn at the ready…!
sentences.cn: 马鞭，单片眼镜，扩音器全都准备好了…！

trans.tran_en: a round piece of glass that you put in front of one eye to help you see better
